Ek Tha Tiger is probably the first major action film which disappointed me to the core. Had expected it to be an out and out action thriller, but all it turned out to be was nothing but a romantic action comedy/drama. The action was excellent, but the screenplay failed to make a mark. The first half was an absolute disaster as there were so many random things happening. The second one was very slow. The film as a whole was extremely boring despite of energetic action. Even the handful of twists appeared uninteresting because the romantic parts made me lose interest, completely.

The movie is sort of watchable. 
Goods: Acting by All actors,visual effects,action sequences,good locations,average screenplay.
Bad:Logic less placement of  action sequences ,illogical situations.,weak dialogues.
This movie is just for Salman fans and for the action loving audience otherwise avoid this movie
